content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No new structures have been successfully placed on the map. Although the agent made repeated attempts to supply and craft a Lab at position (0.5, 2.5), none of these attempts resulted in a successfully placed Lab. Operations involving furnaces for smelting (one at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0) for iron and another at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0) for copper) used pre‐existing equipment; the overall state remains that no new structures have been created by the agent.

ERROR TIPS
• Incorrect use of get_entities:
 – Avoid supplying unexpected keyword arguments (such as ‘radius’) or extra positional arguments. Verify the function’s signature before calling it.
• Lab placement without available inventory:
 – Ensure the Lab item is present in inventory before attempting to place it.
• Iterating over a None value:
 – Check that the result from functions like get_entities is not None (fallback to an empty list) prior to iterating.
• Insufficient ingredients during Lab crafting:
 – Confirm that all intermediate components (e.g., iron-plates for iron-gear-wheel production and copper-plates/copper-cables for electronic-circuit production) are available and that the necessary production setups (such as furnaces or crafting machines) are operational before attempting to craft a Lab.
